ItemTooltips.heart: In case you need more HP and don`t have a lot of damage in order to go for a Satanic, Heart is the right choice. You can get it straight after Manta/BKB.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Required in order to be able to right click people without being interrupted.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Daedalus adds more overall damage but MKB can help against those pesky evasion heroes (PA, Brewmaster, etc. or Butterfly carries).
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Butterfly coupled with BKB makes you really hard to kill. Adds a bit of damage and attack speed too.
ItemTooltips.manta: Manta for survivability and increased DPS. Can be replaced by Drums.
ItemTooltips.satanic: If you feel you need more HP and have enough damage to benefit from the lifesteal, then go for it. Usually you want to get a damage dealing item first (to make full use of the lifesteal).
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Think of Helm as your Midas in a way - if you are doing well, go for it and stack the ancients. If you are having a hard time, get the BKB first.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Allows you to jungle and stay in lane.

AbilityTooltips.luna_lucent_beam: You need to max Lucent Beam asap as your ult depends on it. It is also a pretty strong nuke too. Get it on level 1 if your lane is going to be contested.
AbilityTooltips.luna_moon_glaive: It is not recommended getting this early as it pushes the lane which is generally bad. Get it around level 10 in order to jungle quicker.
AbilityTooltips.luna_lunar_blessing: Ideally you want to start with Lunar Blessing in order to increase your last hit power. Do not get it on level 1 if you expect your lane to be contested.
AbilityTooltips.luna_eclipse: Avoid using it when there are creeps around. Treat it like a Juggernaut ult - look for isolated targets.
